name: Sports Bike Rider: Tricky Stun
description:
Sports Bike Rider: Tricky Stunt is a fun and exciting new motorbike racing driving simulator game for all ages. Drive fast and go off huge jumps like a real stunt driver on motocross bike in this realistic simulation game. Play now

Features:
- Realistic Motorbike Physics.
- High Definition Graphics.
- Multiple Camera Views.
- Easy to Play with Dynamic Controls (Tilt, Buttons, Accelerometer).
